product_name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY Keystone Trails Association Appalachian Trail Map - Susquehanna River to Swatara Gap
long_description: Double-sided map covers sections 7 and 8 of the Appalachian Trail and other informal hiking trails in the vicinity of the AT, north of Harrisburg, PN.
short_description: Double-sided map covers sections 7 and 8 of the Appalachian Trail and other informal hiking trails in the vicinity of the AT, north of Harrisburg, PN.
